tests.integration_tests.network.test_graph_metrics.test_geometric_mean_overflow(input_list, answer)[source]

Test to check geometric mean with overflow returns correct values.

Parameters

  • input_list – The values used to derive a geometric mean.

  • answer – The geometric mean.

tests.integration_tests.network.test_graph_metrics.test_flatten_list(input_list, expected_len)[source]

Test to check helper function works as intended.

Parameters

  • input_list – A ragged list of lists.

  • expected_len – The expected length once flattened.
